div.p: … and Castrensis the slave of (?), column 31, …

Pamas, son of T[ ], column 5, Pauni …; column 18, Thoth …, Peteesis …; column 19, Epeiph …, Herakles …, Esouris son of A[ ] …; column 8 Epeiph …, ? column 20, Athyr 12 …, Ptolemaios …, column, 12 Mesore …, Sabinus …, Satabous …; column 6 Pauni 2 …, column 20, Hathyr … Translation: N. Reggiani, P.Cair.Mich. 2 12 F
